MonsterTrait.Text: The gnome has advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Poisoned Dart
MonsterAction.Text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute.
